review: Love my fire tv stick.  Had a bit of trouble hooking it up.  But, I enjoy it immensley
author: Joy Poston

review: love it, works great , and easy to use.
author: Sydney

review: Love it! I've had Apple TV for a few years but was always frustrated by my inability to watch Amazon shows. I subscribe to services rather than buy shows so I don't miss the ITunes feature on Apple TV.  We take our Fire stick whenever we travel. Great for the 5th wheel and Air Bnb weekends.
author: Shelly

review: Super easy to install. Love it!
author: Shawnna Hitchcock

review: very easy connect and works great!
author: KCLADY "KCLADY"

review: I think it works well, would be better with more ram
author: jerry shockley

review: So far so good. I had no trouble installing the fire stick. Set up was easy and everything worked well. I have had trouble streaming in the past with different devices. This one worked right away.
author: Carlotta Salemi

review: Super easy to get installed! Great programming to choose from. I love that my iPhone can also be the remote!
author: Jbdink
